story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_0200:
I see... So even with this new power, numbers
are still a problem.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_0400:
Surpass your limits even further! Show them your
raw power!
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_0500:
Stop it, Giovanni! That’s going way too far, even
for Mewtwo!
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_0600: Shoot. C’mon, Aerodactyl! We’ve gotta stop him!
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_0900: He took out both of them?
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1100:
I was able to use the power of these sync stones
to amplify Mewtwo’s psychic powers...and it even
Mega Evolved...
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1200:
What a fruitful day! This little experiment is a
resounding success. I would expect no less from a
Pokémon fit to be my partner!
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1300: What a terrible thing to do...
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1400:
Well, I certainly won’t back down from a
challenge if you’d like to battle even more.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1500:
But...if we keep on battling, the burden on
Mewtwo is just going to get worse.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1700:
We shouldn’t punish Pokémon for what humans
do to them...right, Red?
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_1900:
Fine. We’ll let you go this time, Giovanni. But you
won’t get away with this next time.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2000: Heh. Very well. Then I’ll be on my way.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2100:
I can’t wait for another opportunity to show off
this splendid, evil power to the rest of the world.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2300:
Sorry, guys. We had to let him go, even after we
had him cornered...
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2400: There’s no need for you to apologize.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2500:
Yeah. At the very least, this should help get all
those Pokémon to calm down.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2600:
I hate his methods...but Giovanni was actually
able to control Mewtwo’s strengthened psychic
powers, wasn’t he.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2700:
Yeah. The scary thing is, now we know what can
happen when sync stones are misused.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_2800:
According to him, there’s no good or evil when it
comes to power, huh.
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_3000:
Yeah, Red. I know. We’ll stop him no matter how
many times we have to do it!
story_teamrocket_01_26000/2401_1201_3100:
We should head back into town and let Professor
Bellis know what happened!
